subtitle: Follow these instructions and you should have perfect results every time.

method.text: Melt the butter in a pan, add flour and cook for 2 min. Gradually add milk, stirring continuously, and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, mix in the Blue Stilton and cook until melted.
Cool slightly before adding the egg yolks, garlic and seasoning. Remove from the heat. Lay baking parchment on the surface to stop a skin forming. Leave to cool.

Grease individual large ramekin dishes. Whisk the egg whites until they form soft peaks. Fold into the Blue Stilton sauce. Divide between the ramekins and place in a roasting tin half filled with hot water. Loosely cover with foil.
Bake for 35-45 min until firm. Remove and allow to cool. The souffles can be prepared to this stage the day before they are required.
Set the oven to 200°C. Turn the souffles onto individual ovenproof plates. Pour the cream over and sprinkle with Cheddar and breadcrumbs. Bake for 15 min until golden.

title: Twice-baked Blue Stilton and garlic souffles
